overview:
A single, worldwide, unique word represents all you personal, public and sharable information.

What Do We Do? WayConnected reduces all your hundreds of pieces of personal, public and sharable contact information to just ONE WORDâ€¦ your wayID (â„¢). You can give anyone this single-WORD and they will have instant access to your information on any web-enabled device. You can easily choose what to share, item by item, person by person, group by group. You never again have to dictate or email volumes of information and updates to anyoneâ€¦ just give them your wayID. You never again have to enter or update their information eitherâ€¦ just get their wayID. WayConnected will be a free, VIRAL web application, on all platforms, with productivity and revenue implications in multiple dimensions. It will be viral because it is: Free, easy, productive, device agnostic, embodies selfish reasons to use and pass it on and it will be wayCOOL with a compelling reason to get in earlyâ€¦ for EVERYONE.

What Problem Do We Solve? Multiply your hundreds of data items by everyone that shares with you and your world is out-of-control.

WayConnected completely solves this headache! Your wayID makes sharing information simple, fast, selective, effortless, and always up-to-date. Whether youâ€™re asked for your name and phone number in a bar, a business associate in a meeting, your bank, insurance or medical officeâ€¦ your wayID is all you need. This single word represents how you can easily share and control who sees what for all your public and private information. Itâ€™s also how others share with youâ€¦ their wayID.
